Name: Before The Green Moon
About the game: “Before The Green Moon” is a science fiction farming / life simulation game. Explore a small community at the base of a space elevator during the days and seasons leading up to your departure for the moon. Relaxing farming simulation gameplay. Create your own character. Adapt to the region's Wet and Dry seasons. Get to know your neighbors. Explore the community and its surrounding areas. 24 hour day/night cycle, and real-time weather. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Before the Green Moon was developed by Turnfollow Programming and Writing by Ian Endsley Art and Sound by Carter Lodwick Music by Scott Archer, Marissa Deitz, and Carter Lodwick
